note.p: Civil servant. Brother of Anthony Rich. Clerk in the registrar’s office, Court of Chancery, 1851; senior clerk, 1861. Living on his own means, 1871.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1593/68/22), 1861 (RG9/2538/27/12), 1871 (RG10/1106/124/37)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 7 July 2017)
Gloucestershire, England, Church of England baptisms, 1813–1913 (Ancestry.com, accessed 7 July 2017)
London, England, Church of England baptisms, marriages and burials, 1538–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 7 July 2017)
